mapper.update: update br_order set merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_order_no = #{merchantOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_order_no = #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_url = #{successUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_url = #{errorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, callback_status = #{callbackStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, callback_type = #{callbackType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deadline_time = #{deadlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
